entry.title: How to prevent the automatic creation of delivery and invoice of customer returns
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

After creating a returns order (CBAR), either through app or API, the system automatically executes two processes:

  • Automatic creation of delivery document;
  • Automatic creation of invoice.

Is it possible to prevent those automatic creations or delay it in any way?

Thank you.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Flexible Workflow for purchase order "Email notification Request for approval"
entry.content:
Hello,

We have setup flexible workflow for purchase orders. The requirement is to send a Email notification notifying the approver that a purchase order is pending his/her approval. In the flexible workflow setup, I have seen standard email templates for "Approved" and "Rejected" purchase orders, but not for "To be approved" purchase orders.  As this seems to be a standard requirement, I am wondering if the "To be approved" notification is differently triggered? If not, is there a way to develop this? 

Thanks for any input!

entry.title: Packaging Instruction Determination Not Triggering Dialog in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I’m having trouble with the packaging instruction determination in Public Cloud for Warehouse Management.

In configuration, under
Logistics, Transportation, and Warehousing / Tracking, Tracing, and Identification / Packing / Maintain Packing Transaction Profile,
for transaction profiles 0001 and 0025, I assigned the Determination Procedure for Packaging Instructions “000013” and enabled both “Packing Instruction Selection Dialog” and “Respect Alternative Packing Instruction.”

However, when I press the Packing button in the inbound delivery (VL31N) or when using the Change Inbound Deliveries app, no selection dialog appears, even though multiple alternative packaging instructions exist.

Is there something I’m missing? Is an additional step required to make the dialog appear?

Thanks in advance for any insights

entry.title: Cost center determination logic in Price difference when running MIGO for Purchaseorder.
entry.content:
Dear Community
I have a question of determination logic of cost center when there is price difference between standard price and price in the purchase order.

This is my example)
Material A : standard price = 5100, valuation class = 7920 and Profit center = YB110
And PO Prices for Material A is 6000

So, When I run the MIGO based on that PO# I got this post result's in the system.

When I see the Lineitem 001, the profit center is successfully determined based on Material's profit center.

But, when I see the lineitem 003 for price difference, the profit center is different from Material. (not YB110)

So, I checked the Default Account Assignments for cost element 52041000, but there is no default profit center or costcenter in my partner system.

I want to know the determination logic of cost center and profit center for price difference 52041000 (Loss Prc Var PRD)

Kindly share your knowledge
Best Regards,

entry.title: Failed to post Physical Inventory Document due to unknown reconciliation issue Code: M7059
entry.content:
We are trying to post Physical Inventory Document which failed. We have checked Account Auto-Determination, and make sure that GBB is assigned to account DIGITS.

Diagnosis

No direct postings can be made to the G/L account (because it is a reconciliation account).

System Response

The system cannot post the amount to this account.

Procedure

If the system has determined the G/L account, the system setting is faulty. Contact your systems administrator.

If you have entered the G/L account manually, enter a different account or cancel the account entered, so that the system determines an account automatically.

Message no. M7059

 

When we view account in app Manage G/L Account Master we cannot see assignment to reconciliation account. 

 

 

 

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Packing instruction and determination by using reference material - Public Cloud WM
entry.content:
Hi,
I am setting up packing instruction using reference material. According to documentation, the you need to :
1. Create reference material (in my example ref-pallet1) (VERP) which is maintained on products (WMTG12) which are packed same way as reference material. On material WMTG12 reference mat.for packing is maintained.

 

2. Then packing instruction is created for reference materials ref-pallet1. Row is marked with R.

3. Determination is maintained for 0IBD Inbound delivery

If I now test to pack in WM inbound delivery, it does not create HU automatically. 

If I maintain the determination for WMTG12 by using same packing instruction -> then system is able to pack according to instruction. Is this how it is supposed to work? I understood from SAP documentation that the determination would be maintained only for reference material?

entry.title: delivery block at credit management in Cloud ERP
entry.content:
In ERP, delivery Block can be performed using credit management.

Can Cloud ERP delivery Block due to credit management?

In SSCUI 102137, "A", "B", and "C" cannot be selected for "credit check"

"D":auto credit management only

But In SSCUI:101707, I can set credit limit checks for each delivery type.

entry.title: Issue with Sending Email Notifications for PO Approval Workflow in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
I created a PO approval workflow and it works fine.
The client then requested email notifications for three cases:

  • PO approved

  • PO rejected

  • PO on hold

I configured Email Templates, the Notifications section in the workflow, and assigned the notifications to the relevant roles/users.
However, no emails are being sent.

Is there any additional configuration needed in CBC, or any prerequisite activation before workflow email notifications can work?

Any advice would be helpful.

entry.title: Credit Memo on Asset Triggers “Negative Acquisition Value” Error- Explanation requested
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I’d like to share an update regarding an issue I previously raised. When posting a credit memo on an asset in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, the system triggers error messages about negative acquisition values—even for very small amounts (e.g., 1 euro).

 

Context:

  • The asset is still in the first year of its useful life. (5years)

  • The asset class is ZMAT.

Temporary Solution Applied: Following community advice, we enabled the “Negative values allowed” option temporarily in the asset master data. This allowed us to successfully post the credit memo.

My Question:

Could you please help me understand the business rationale behind this behavior and the implications of applying this workaround? I am aware that enabling “Negative values allowed” is generally recommended for Assets under Construction (AuC), but does the same recommendation apply to fixed assets as well? In other words, is this workaround considered a best practice by SAP, or should we explore alternative configurations to prevent potential issues in reporting, compliance, or asset management in the future?

 

Thank you in advance for your insights!

FIN Asset Accounting  SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Asset Management  SAP ERP

entry.title: Facing issues during Depreciation posting in SAP Cloud
entry.content:
Hi Community,

We are facing an issue during the depreciation run where the system displays the error: “Account assignment not available.” When we attempt to update the account assignment, another error appears: “Please change account assignment objects in new time intervals.”

We understand this error occurs when postings already exist. Upon checking, we found that depreciation has been posted under Depreciation Area 15 for November with Journal Entry G000003452, but there are no postings under other depreciation areas.

Could you please guide us on:

Where is this G-series journal entry posted? and this entry cannot be reversed
How can we proceed to post depreciation for Depreciation Areas 01 and 34 for November?

Thank you for your support.

Thanks
Naveen Kumar

entry.title: Different list of entries in app settings for manage planned orders (F4170)
entry.content:
Dear community,

there are a few users in department with the same set of roles, except the key user with some additional roles. When they open the app manage planned orders (F4170) they can change the area of responsibility (AOR) in the personal settings. The options look like this:

Now there is a new user with a recently created user account with the same set of roles. He will get a different list of options in the MRP settings, asking for AoR and usage of app F0251A:

What is causing this different list of options? I did not find any hint in the roles and restrictions how to modify the content of the app settings.

Thank you.

Regards,

Dirk

entry.title: Is it possible to get journal entry async API confirmation in single payload?
entry.content:
Hi,

I am using below API to create all the required journal entries through single payload. This i am doing by splitting the node (JournalEntryCreateRequest) with number of journal entry needed.

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/b978f98fc5884ff2aeb10c8fdeb8a43b/22a267e571e948499fda007a65b27c64.html?locale=en-US&state=PRODUCTION&version=2508.500&q=TAX+ACCOUNT

But, when the confirmation is getting generated it is sending separate confirmation payload by journal entry created rather than single payload with information of all journal entries created.

 

This was not the case before. can you please help in letting me know where would be the issue?

Thanks & regards
